name: cbvopabv
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wceq(copab(s0, s1, w0), copab(s2, s3, w1))
-| wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3))), wb(w0, w1))

comment: Rule used to change bound variables in an ordered-pair class abstraction, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by NM, 15-Oct-1996.)
